jumbotron.heading: $VRSC coin.test
jumbotron.text: A coin full of energy and utility. Servicing the economy.

payment.heading: Payments
payment.text: $VRSC is used for cheap, fast, scalable and final payments.

staking.heading: Staking
staking.text: Anyone with $VRSC can start staking and earn. No minimum requirements.

verus.heading: VerusID
verus.text: Pay $VRSC to the protocol for VerusID creation.

blockchain.heading: Blockchains
blockchain.text: Pay $VRSC to the protocol to create interoperable blockchains.

token.heading: Tokens
token.text: Pay $VRSC to the protocol to create tokens and currencies.

defi.heading: DeFi
defi.text: DeFi tokens and currencies on the Verus mainchain must have $VRSC in its reserves.
